2.4.8.name: wordpress/wp-image-annotation
2.4.8.description:
This plugin allows you to add textual annotations to images by select a region of the image and then attach a textual description, the concept of annotating images with user comments. Integration with JQuery Image Annotation from Chris (http://www.flipbit.co.uk/jquery-image-annotation.html) with PHP support from GitHub (http://github.com/stas/jquery-image-annotate-php-fork).

Some features:

  • Admin page
  • Option to approve, edit amd remove image notes in admin page.
  • Auto insert unique id attribute for all the images for image note.
  • Show notes on other pages such as home and archive.
  • Gravatar in the notes
  • Option to sync with wordpress comments.
  • Option to show thumbnail in comment list.
  • Option to include post id in every auto insert images id.
